title: Export Quantile and Isotonic Regression in public API
description: Add new regressors to lib.rs exports and prelude module. Ensure consistent API with existing regressors (builder pattern, fit/predict methods).
close_reason: Closed

title: Isotonic: Floating point edge cases
description: Test PAVA with floating point edge cases per Geyer notes. Verify termination with inexact arithmetic. Test block detection near equality. Validate with very small differences between adjacent values.
close_reason: Edge case tests created in isotonic_edge_cases.rs (27 tests)

title: Quantile: Extreme quantiles edge cases (tau near 0 or 1)
description: Test extreme quantiles tau=0.01, 0.05, 0.95, 0.99. Validate numerical stability at distribution tails. Compare with R quantreg behavior at boundaries.
close_reason: Closed

title: Isotonic: Input validation edge cases
description: Test error handling: dimension mismatch, insufficient observations (n<1), negative weights, all-zero weights, weight dimension mismatch. Match existing crate patterns from OLS/WLS tests.
close_reason: Edge case tests created in isotonic_edge_cases.rs (27 tests)

title: Isotonic: Large dataset performance (n=10000+)
description: Validate O(n) PAVA performance with large datasets. Test with n=10000, n=100000. Verify monotonicity constraint maintained. Compare fitted values precision with small datasets.
close_reason: Edge case tests created in isotonic_edge_cases.rs (27 tests)

title: Isotonic: Special data patterns
description: Test with all equal values, already monotonic data, completely reversed data, alternating pattern. Verify correct pooling behavior in each case. Validate R² calculation for edge cases.
close_reason: Edge case tests created in isotonic_edge_cases.rs (27 tests)

title: Add Quantile Regression and Isotonic Regression Methods
description: Implement probabilistic forecasting methods: Quantile Regression for conditional quantile estimation and Isotonic Regression for monotonic constraints. Both methods validated against R packages with extensive test coverage.
close_reason: Closed

title: Create R validation script for Quantile Regression
description: Generate test data using R's quantreg package with set.seed(42) for reproducibility. Include test cases for: multiple quantiles (0.1, 0.25, 0.5, 0.75, 0.9), simple linear regression, multiple regression, and edge cases.
close_reason: R validation scripts created and tested successfully

title: Quantile: Collinearity and rank deficiency handling
description: Test with perfectly collinear features, constant columns, zero-variance columns. Verify aliased coefficient handling matches OLS pattern. Test prediction with NaN coefficients.
close_reason: Edge case tests created in quantile_edge_cases.rs covering input validation, collinearity, and convergence

title: Create integration tests for Quantile Regression
description: Write Rust integration tests validating against R quantreg output. Test multiple quantiles, coefficient estimation, prediction, and edge cases. Use tolerance appropriate for iterative optimization (0.01-0.05).
close_reason: Closed

title: Quantile: Stackloss dataset validation
description: Validate against R quantreg stackloss dataset (21 obs, multivariate). Test median and quartile regression. Known edge case: 8 of 21 points lie exactly on 25th percentile plane.
close_reason: Closed

title: Quantile: Convergence and numerical stability
description: Test IRLS convergence with various tolerance settings. Verify finite coefficients and predictions. Test with extreme coefficient magnitudes. Validate epsilon smoothing behavior.
close_reason: Edge case tests created in quantile_edge_cases.rs covering input validation, collinearity, and convergence

title: Quantile: Outlier robustness validation
description: Test robustness to outliers compared to OLS. Median regression should be more robust. Validate with synthetic outlier data and compare breakdown point.
close_reason: Closed

title: Isotonic: Out-of-bounds prediction modes
description: Test all OutOfBounds modes (Clip, Nan, Extrapolate). Validate boundary behavior for predictions outside training range. Test with extrapolation both above and below training data.
close_reason: Edge case tests created in isotonic_edge_cases.rs (27 tests)

title: Create R validation script for Isotonic Regression
description: Generate test data using R's isoreg() and isotone package with set.seed(42) for reproducibility. Include test cases for: simple monotonic increasing, monotonic decreasing, with weights, and edge cases.
close_reason: R validation scripts created and tested successfully

title: Create integration tests for Isotonic Regression
description: Write Rust integration tests validating against R isoreg() output. Test monotonic constraints, weighted regression, prediction, and edge cases. Tolerance should be tight (1e-6) as PAVA is deterministic.
close_reason: Closed

title: Implement Isotonic Regression core
description: Implement isotonic (monotonic) regression using Pool Adjacent Violators Algorithm (PAVA). Support both increasing and decreasing constraints, observation weights, and out-of-sample prediction via interpolation.
close_reason: Core implementations completed, all unit tests passing

title: Quantile: Engel food expenditure dataset validation
description: Validate against R quantreg engel dataset (235 obs, income vs foodexp). Test multiple quantiles (0.05, 0.1, 0.25, 0.5, 0.75, 0.9, 0.95). Classic heteroscedastic example from Koenker & Bassett 1982.
close_reason: Closed

title: Isotonic: PAVA ties handling validation
description: Extensive testing of ties in x values. Validate averaging behavior. Test primary/secondary tie handling approaches. Compare with R isotone package gpava() function.
close_reason: Edge case tests created in isotonic_edge_cases.rs (27 tests)

title: Update VALIDATION.md for Quantile and Isotonic Regression
description: Document validation approach for both new methods including: R packages used (quantreg, isotone), tolerance choices, test cases, and implementation notes. Follow existing documentation patterns.
close_reason: Closed

title: Extensive Validation for Quantile and Isotonic Regression
close_reason: All 16 validation subtasks completed with 60+ tests

title: Quantile: Input validation edge cases
description: Test error handling: dimension mismatch, insufficient observations (n<2), invalid tau (<=0 or >=1), negative weights, all-zero weights, weight dimension mismatch. Match existing crate patterns.
close_reason: Edge case tests created in quantile_edge_cases.rs covering input validation, collinearity, and convergence

title: Implement Quantile Regression core
description: Implement quantile regression using interior point or simplex method. Support multiple quantiles (0.1, 0.25, 0.5, 0.75, 0.9), confidence intervals, and standard errors. Match R quantreg package behavior.
close_reason: Core implementations completed, all unit tests passing

title: Both: Two observations minimum edge case
description: Test minimum viable input (n=2) for both Quantile and Isotonic regression. Verify correct coefficients and predictions. Compare with R output for same edge case.
close_reason: Minimum observations and statistical properties tested in both edge case files

title: Isotonic: Weighted PAVA validation vs isotone package
description: Validate weighted isotonic regression against R isotone::gpava(). Test extreme weight ratios (1:1000). Test weighted mean vs weighted median solvers. Verify weighted averaging in block pooling.
close_reason: Edge case tests created in isotonic_edge_cases.rs (27 tests)

title: Both: Statistical properties validation
description: Validate R²/pseudo-R² bounds [0,1]. Test residual properties. Verify prediction consistency across methods. Compare statistical output with R for same datasets.
close_reason: Minimum observations and statistical properties tested in both edge case files
